TopicTitle: The TRN Baluga- Freedom On The Go

Articles.Content:
Well it's the first of it's kind. after a lot of tries and a lot of time (and versions of KSP-even tried it in 0.22) i am proud to present the first fully^[1]^ operational aircraft carrier in the kerbal universe.

[1] Warranty void if used at speeds of over 15 m/s at landing or takeoff. VTOL recommended 

still a few kinks to iron out in regards of propulsion(the aero makes it yaw) and it's top speed is 7 m/s.

The ship itself is 900 parts exactly and weights 280 mT. It's dimensions are- 94.3 meters long and 29 meters wide (at it's widest point).

It's deck is huge and could fit multiple crafts at the same time.

[**DOWNLOAD**](https://www.dropbox.com/s/pwo9shhok3juh1o/TRN%20Baluga.craft?dl=0)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/UKOGa)
It's... it's massive. That part count would kill most computers though. How many FPS do you get when flying it?
less then 30. but my PC is not the best

Woah...

Well this is far more impressive ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
